fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit a player, showing them and all their visitors a good time. The affected player(s) will be told they were shown a good time.
- If you die, once per game you can pay an astral visit to a living player during a day phase and show them a good time.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who visits you or someone who has previously been shown a good time will also be shown a good time.
- Jailor-type roles who jail someone who has been shown a good time will also be shown a good time.
- Players who are shown a good time will always be notified that they were shown a good time regardless of any feedback manipulation.
- You can still win even if you die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Show every living player a good time.
